item.description:
Advance and the Melbourne-Boston Sister City Association invite you a private reception with the Victorian Commissioner to the Americas, Mr Victor Perton, to launch the Victorians Abroad network in Boston.

Associate Professor Marcus Breen from the Melbourne-Boston Sister City Association will also be there to share his thoughts on the special sister city relationship we share.

Date: August 20, Thursday
Time: 6.00pm - 8.00pm

Harvard Club of Boston
The Aesculapian Room

374 Commonwealth Ave Boston
Massachusetts MA 02215

Please RSVP by Tuesday 18 August (Please follow the link below for RSVP):
http://www.advance.or...
(Hint: Click the Yellow highlighted region to RSVP... took me ages to work that out...)

Victorians Abroad aims to connect you with home - providing information on the latest business and employment opportunities in Victoria, ideas on how you can be an ambassador for Victoria while overseas, and opportunities to network with fellow Victorians in your region.

Membership is free and open to all expatriates, repatriates and alumni of Victorian universities so make sure you tell your friends and encourage them to JOIN.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Advance @ Harvard Club, Boston
